org.springframework.cloud.servicebroker.model

Class ServiceBrokerRequest

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.springframework.cloud.servicebroker.model.ServiceBrokerRequest
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    AsyncServiceInstanceRequest, CreateServiceInstanceBindingRequest, DeleteServiceInstanceBindingRequest, GetLastServiceOperationRequest

    public abstract class ServiceBrokerRequest
extends java.lang.Object
    Details common to all service broker requests.
    Author:
    Scott Frederick

      protected java.lang.String apiInfoLocation
      The API info endpoint of the platform instance making the call to the service broker.
      protected java.lang.String cfInstanceId

        public static final java.lang.String ORIGINATING_IDENTITY_HEADER
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • cfInstanceId

        protected transient java.lang.String cfInstanceId
        The ID used to identify the platform instance when the service broker is registered to multiple instances. Will be null if the service broker is not registered with an instance ID in the registered URL.

      • apiInfoLocation

        protected transient java.lang.String apiInfoLocation
        The API info endpoint of the platform instance making the call to the service broker.

      • originatingIdentity

        protected transient Context originatingIdentity
        The identity of the of the user that initiated the request from the platform.
